long_description: Load your hammock (sold separately) into the ENO Possum Pocket, throw it over your shoulder and head to the campsite or a creekside lounge spot. 180 cu. in. volume provides enough room for your ENO hammock, ENO SlapStraps and a few other small essentials (sold separately). External slash pocket keeps small items easily accessible. Hang the Possum Pocket at the end of your hammock while you're lounging. Sling the adjustable shoulder strap over a shoulder to carry the ENO Possum Pocket hammock bag.
short_description: Load your hammock (sold separately) into the ENO Possum Pocket, throw it over your shoulder and head to the campsite or a creekside lounge spot.
